short_summary: , the subject line will read, one (1) Universal Testing Machine (UTM) and associated accessories for the testing of crushing strength of iron ore pellets are required to meet or exceed the minimum specifications outlined in the Statement of Requirement and in accordance with the mandatory evaluation criteria.
description: {"speech": "The procurement of a universal testing machine (UTM) is suitable for iron ore pellets and this TENDER NOTICE is designed to purchase the UTM and its associated accessories in compliance with the mandatory criteria...", "print_signature": " Vincci Eg"}
full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement: NRCan-5000077272

#### Tender Reference

*   Solicitation Number: NRCan-5000077272
*   Reference Number: CB-623-23126842
*   Amendment Number: 3

#### Tender Notice Details

*   **Title (English)**: Notice of Proposed Procurement - NRCan-5000077272 - Universal testing machine (UTM)
*   **Title (French)**: Avis de projet de marché - NRCan-5000077272 - Machine d'essai universelle
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-11-01
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-11T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2023-12-11
*   **Tender Status:** Expiré

#### Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
*   **Procurement Type:** Goods and Services (no appraisal required)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Tender Specifications

*   ** Tender Description:** The Natural Resources Canada wishes to acquire one (1) Universal Testing Machine (UTM) and associated accessories.
*   **Instructions to Offerors:** Clarifications on technical specifications and more detailed information are available in the Statement of Requirement document provided.
*   **Evaluation Criteria:** The mandatory evaluation criteria will be based on compliance with the specifications outlined.

#### Contact Information

*   **Name:** Vincent Gariépy
*   **Email:** [vincent.gariepy@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:vincent.gariepy@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** 819239-9895
*   **Address:** 212 Place de la Cité, Suite 212, Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada

#### Documents

The following documents are available for download:

*   [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23698/avis-de-projet-de-marche-nrcan-5000077272.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23698/avis-de-projet-de-marche-nrcan-5000077272.pdf)
